column3: NACK.\n\nThe reason it's currently done this way (only enable `-Wdocumentation` when passing `--enable-suppress-external-warnings`) is to prevent regular builders from seeing warnings. For example, if you build this branch on macOS, using libraries installed via `brew`, you'll see 1000s of warnings from libevent, boost etc (small except below). The current implementation is enough to prevent new
